steps.notes: Machine mounting surfaces, align column bore, finish table T-slots
Mount spindle head to column, install table height adjustment, attach depth stop
Install motor, mount belt and pulleys, tension drive belt, check speed adjustment
Align spindle perpendicularity, test depth stop accuracy, verify speed ranges, test drill operation

recipe_def.assumptions: Machined cast iron column with precision spindle assembly. Belt-driven motor for speed variation. Total mass ~120 kg.
recipe_def.notes: Drill press assembly from machined components. Precision vertical drilling machine for metalworking and fabrication.

steps.notes: Crush and grind coarse regolith to powder
Extract oxygen and produce metal byproduct via MRE

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.

steps.notes: Melt raw material (metal, glass, ceramic) in crucible or furnace to liquid or semi-solid forming temperature

recipe_def.assumptions: Generic molten material or preform ready for casting, molding, or forming operations. 1 kg typical batch. Includes molten metals (steel, aluminum, copper at 600-1600°C), molten glass (basalt glass at 1100-1400°C), molten ceramics, or semi-solid preforms at forming temperature. Material maintained at appropriate temperature for subsequent processing. Intermediate product in manufacturing chain.
recipe_def.notes: Production of molten material or preform via melting and temperature control. Total processing time ~2.5 hours. Generic recipe applies to multiple material types - specific temperatures and processes vary by material class. Used as input to casting, fiber drawing, molding, and forming operations.

steps.notes: Create casting pattern for machine column with core prints and draft angles
Cast iron casting of large machine column structure with internal ribs
Machine mounting surfaces, precision-grind ways, drill/tap mounting holes
Heat treatment to relieve casting stresses and stabilize dimensions
Verify dimensional accuracy, surface finish, and flatness of critical surfaces

recipe_def.assumptions: Large cast iron casting requiring pattern making, sand casting, stress relief, and precision machining. Internal ribbing for rigidity and vibration damping.
recipe_def.notes: Heavy machine tool column providing rigid support for spindle heads and carriages. Cast iron provides excellent vibration damping and dimensional stability for precision machining operations.

steps.notes: Machine mounting surfaces, align column bore, finish table T-slots
Mount spindle head to column, install table height adjustment, attach depth stop
Install motor, mount belt and pulleys, tension drive belt, check speed adjustment
Align spindle perpendicularity, test depth stop accuracy, verify speed ranges, test drill operation
